> **NOTE:** Available in 1.126.0+

## Import


CEN transit router VBR attachment can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import alicloud:cen/transitRouterVbrAttachment:TransitRouterVbrAttachment example tr-********:tr-attach-********
```
